English: HEY RASHIV, WHERE DO YOU THINK YOU'RE GOING? GET BACK TO FORMATION IMMEDIATELY!
This is not the right way... I should head back...
RASHIV, THE BATTLEFIELD IS THIS WAY! GET BACK TO FORMATION!
RASHIV, I GAVE YOU AN ORDER, DIDN'T I? STOP FUCKING AROUND AND GET BACK TO THE MISSION!
KUKUSHKIN, WHERE THE HELL ARE YOU GOING? TURN THAT TANK AROUND AND RETURN TO YOUR MISSION! BAZA OUT.
Where the hell am I? I need to get back to the mission.
I can't leave. Not yet. I must finish what I started.
I am way off course. I should turn this thing around and get back to the mission.
